text: nakattaiyutaiya anaittaiyum yutarkalukku nam haramakkiyiruntom; atu, matu akiyavarril - avarrin mutukukalilo allatu vayirukalilo allatu elumpukalutan kalanto irukkum koluppait tavira marra avarrin koluppaiyum haramakkinom - avarkal akkiramam ceyta karanattinal avarkalukku itanai nam kuliyaka kotuttom - niccayamaka nam unmaiye kurukirom
